summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackINKEY Peptide Face Moisturizer is a nourishing-yet-fast-absorbing daily moisturizer with a dual peptide formula aiming to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis moisturizer is formulated with peptides, which are small-yet-powerful amino acid chains that support visibly firming and hydrating proteins for your skinWith continued use, these peptides help support natural collagen, leaving skin looking plumper, youthful, and hydratedKey IngredientsRoyal Epigen P5 2%: Nurtures skin to help decrease the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesHydrating Peptide Solution 1%: Supports your skinâ€™s moisture barrier for visibly radiant skinItem 2641997How To UseSuggested Usage:-Can be used in the morning and evening.-After cleansing and applying your serum of choice, massage a pea-size amount onto face and neck.Ask INKEY Recipe Tip:-In need of extra hydration? Pair this product with The INKEY List's Hyaluronic Acid Serum (sold separately) to retain skin's moisture and lock it in.-Age delay concerns? Pair this product with The INKEY List's Retinol Serum (sold separately) to help further smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.IngredientsAqua (Water/Eau), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Betaine, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Gluconate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Phenethyl Alcohol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-37, Maltodextrin, Pentapeptide-48.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Can be used in the morning and evening.-After cleansing and applying your serum of choice, massage a pea-size amount onto face and neck.Ask INKEY Recipe Tip:-In need of extra hydration? Pair this product with The INKEY List's Hyaluronic Acid Serum (sold separately) to retain skin's moisture and lock it in.-Age delay concerns? Pair this product with The INKEY List's Retinol Serum (sold separately) to help further smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

faceoff_positive.comments: I gifted by the Inkey List The Inkey List Bio Active Ceramide Repairing and Plumbing Moisturiser and I would like to give my honest feedback on it. First of all it's great and simple style of the product which will fit nicely in your bathroom shelf.I was using this cream for 4 weeks and I can tell you that my skin looks more hydrated and glowing.The cream has a nice texture,easy for absorbing and there is no distinctive sense which can be a bonus.It can be a great base for makeup,your skin after use isn't oily and foundation cream goes smoothly on this cream.Also I noticed not many creams have a SPF factor and this cream does which can be very handy for sunny summer days ahead. It's great value for money and I definitely will buy it again.It does moisturize my skin well and it suits my sensitive skin as well I didn't see any bad reaction after using it!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great moisturiser

faceoff_negative.comments: I used this for some time and love the creamy moisturiser, but I've stopped using it now they've changed to this horrible tube from the old dispenser. I can't get the stuff out of the tube! I thought it was just me as I have arthritis in my hands but reading other reviews realise lots of other people are complaining about this. The moisturiser is very difficult to squeeze out and you can't get it all out of the tube, so the only way to use up all the product is to cut the tube open with scissors and then put cling film over it to stop it drying out. Really poor.
faceoff_negative.headline: Moisturiser great but terrible packaging
